resume_snippet: SUMMARY: With nearly 30 years of experience in biologics, therapeutics proteins, pharmaceuticals, and medical devices, this professional excels in Quality Assurance, Regulatory Affairs, CMC, GLP, and clinical trials. Expertise includes FDA 21 CFR 210/211, ISO 13485, 510(K), PMA, and NDA/IND/ANDA submissions. Holds Master’s degrees in Biochemistry and an MBA, with over 12 patents awarded and 29 pending.
